Wanjiru Kinyanjui (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ odee Kenya, onye na-ede uri, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Kinyanjui nwetara nzere masta na akwụkwọ Bekee na German tupu ọ mụọ ihe nkiri na German Film and Television Academy Berlin

Ihe nkiri Kinyanjui nke afọ 1994 bụ Battle of the Sacred Tree, nke na-elekwasị anya n'otu nwanyị nọ n'etiti ụkpụrụ ọdịnala Kikuyu na omume 'ọgbara ọhụrụ', bụ nke Birne Film (Germany) na Flamingo Films (France) kwadoro, mepụta ma kesaa.
